[93mblending[0m for [93mpollutant[0m [93mremoval[0m, which [93mprovided[0m [93mtechnological[0m [93mconcepts[0m for the [93mwaste[0m [93mutilization[0m of [93mscrap[0m [93miron[0m and [93maluminum[0m.

- [93mIsoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mmodifications[0m of [93mtropoelastin[0m by [93mHOCl[0m and [93mMPO[0m [93malter[0m [93mprotein[0m [93mself[0m-[93massembly[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mTropoelastin[0m ([93mTE[0m), the [93msoluble[0m [93mprecursor[0m of [93melastin[0m, is [93mcritical[0m for the [93melasticity[0m of [93marteries[0m, [93mlungs[0m, and [93mskin[0m. [93mOxidative[0m [93mdamage[0m to [93mTE[0m [93mhas[0m been [93mimplicated[0m in [93mvascular[0m [93mdiseases[0m, but the [93misoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93meffects[0m [93mremain[0m [93mpoorly[0m [93munderstood[0m. [93mHypochlorous[0m [93macid[0m ([93mHOCl[0m), [93mgenerated[0m by the [93menzyme[0m [93mmyeloperoxidase[0m ([93mMPO[0m) [93mtargets[0m [93mextracellular[0m [93mmatrix[0m [93mproteins[0m during [93minflammatory[0m [93mprocesses[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mdifferential[0m [93msusceptibility[0m and [93mfunctional[0m [93mconsequences[0m in [93mspecific[0m [93mTE[0m [93misoforms[0m are [93munknown[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mWe[0m [95minvestigated[0m the [93meffects[0m of [93mHOCl[0m and [93mMPO[0m-[93mderived[0m [93moxidants[0m on [93mtwo[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mTE[0m [93misoforms[0m, [93mTE2[0m and [93mTE6[0m. [93mOxidative[0m [93mmodifications[0m were [93manalyzed[0m [93musing[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mresolution[0m [93mLC[0m-[93mMS[0m/[93mMS[0m, with [93msite[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93midentification[0m of [93mchlorinated[0m [93mtyrosines[0m and [93moxidized[0m [93mcysteine[0m [93mresidues[0m. [93mFunctional[0m [93mconsequences[0m were [93massessed[0m [93musing[0m [93mturbidity[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcoacervation[0m [93massays[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mTE2[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93mchlorination[0m at [93mmultiple[0m [93mtyrosine[0m [93mresidues[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93m3[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mdichlorotyrosine[0m, while [93mshowing[0m [93mminimal[0m [93mcysteine[0m [93moxidation[0m. In [93mcontrast[0m, [93mTE6[0m was [93mmore[0m [93moxidised[0m at its [93msingle[0m [93mdisulfide[0m [93mbond[0m, [93mresulting[0m in [93mirreversible[0m [93msulfonic[0m [93macid[0m [93mformation[0m. These [93misoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93mpatterns[0m [93mtranslated[0m into [93mfunctional[0m [93mdifferences[0m: [93mTE2[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m [93menhanced[0m [93mcoacervation[0m , [93mwhereas[0m [93mTE6[0m [93mshowed[0m [93mreduced[0m [93massembly[0m [93mcapacity[0m, [93mconsistent[0m with [93mstructural[0m [93mdestabilization[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mHOCl[0m and [93mMPO[0m-[93mderived[0m [93moxidants[0m [93minduce[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93mmodifications[0m in [93mtropoelastin[0m [93misoforms[0m, [93mresulting[0m in [93mdivergent[0m [93meffects[0m on [93mprotein[0m [93mself[0m-[93massembly[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mhighlight[0m the [93mimportance[0m of [93misoform[0m [93mcontext[0m in [93mextracellular[0m [93mmatrix[0m [93mremodeling[0m under [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and [93mmay[0m [93mhave[0m [93mimplications[0m for [93mvascular[0m [93mpathologies[0m.

In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mdetermine[0m [93mcryo[0m-[93mEM[0m [93mstructures[0m of [93msuccinate[0m [93mdehydrogenase[0m ([93mSDH[0m) from [93mChloroflexus[0m [93maurantiacus[0m ([93mCaSDH[0m), a [93mfacultative[0m [93mfilamentous[0m [93manoxygenic[0m [93mphototroph[0m ([93mFAP[0m) that [93mforms[0m [93mone[0m of the [93mearliest[0m [93mbranches[0m of [93mphotosynthetic[0m [93mbacteria[0m. The [93mstructures[0m of [93mtrimeric[0m [93mCaSDH[0m, [93mresolved[0m in [93mboth[0m [93mapo[0m- and [93mMK[0m-[93mbound[0m [93mforms[0m, [93mreveal[0m a [93msingle[0m [93mmembrane[0m-[93manchoring[0m [93msubunit[0m [93mcontaining[0m [93mtwo[0m [93mb[0m-[93mtype[0m [93mhemes[0m, a [93mcanonical[0m [93mQ[0m [93mP[0m [93msite[0m, and a [93mQ[0m [93mD[0m [93msite[0m with [93matypical[0m [93mlocation[0m, [93mconfiguration[0m and [93mspecificity[0m, [93meach[0m [93mbound[0m to [93mMK[0m [93mmolecules[0m. [93mUsing[0m [93mstructural[0m [93manalysis[0m, [93mEPR[0m, and [93menzymatic[0m [93massays[0m, [93mwe[0m [93muncover[0m [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m [91mpathways[0m [93mconnecting[0m [93msuccinate[0m [93moxidation[0m to [93mMK[0m [93mreduction[0m at the [93mQ[0m [93mP[0m and [93mQ[0m [93mD[0m [93msites[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mprovide[0m [93mstructural[0m [93minsights[0m into the [93melectron[0m and [93mproton[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mmechanisms[0m of [93mMK[0m-[93mdependent[0m [93mdiheme[0m [93mSQRs[0m and [93mestablish[0m a [93mfoundation[0m for [93mstructure[0m-[93mbased[0m [93minhibitor[0m [92mdesign[0m and [93mantibacterial[0m [93mdrug[0m [93mdevelopment[0m [93mtargeting[0m these [93menzymes[0m.
- [93mSpatially[0m [93mResolved[0m [93mIon[0m [93mSensing[0m by [93mVoltammetric[0m [93mIon[0m [93mTransfer[0m [93mMicroscopy[0m.: The [93mvisualization[0m and [93mmapping[0m of [93mionic[0m [93mspecies[0m in [93msolution[0m and [93mnear[0m [93msurfaces[0m are [93mimportant[0m to [93munderstand[0m [93mchemical[0m [93mgradients[0m and [93mspatially[0m [93mresolved[0m [93mdynamic[0m [93mprocesses[0m in [93mvarious[0m [93mfields[0m. [93mAvailable[0m [93mlabel[0m-[93mfree[0m [93mapproaches[0m are [93meither[0m [93mslow[0m or [93mrestricted[0m to a [93mfew[0m [93mparameters[0m, [93msuch[0m as [93mpH[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mintroduce[0m [93mhere[0m a [93mnovel[0m [93mchemical[0m [93mmapping[0m [93mprinciple[0m for the [93mspatially[0m [93mresolved[0m [93msensing[0m of [93moptically[0m [93msilent[0m [93mionic[0m [93mspecies[0m at [93mhigh[0m [93mfrequency[0m, [93macquiring[0m a [93mconcentration[0m [93mmap[0m of [93mmillions[0m of [93mpixels[0m in [93mseconds[0m [93musing[0m a [93mconventional[0m [93mfluorescence[0m [93mmicroscope[0m. The [93mprinciple[0m [93mrelies[0m on [93mion[0m [93mtransfer[0m from a [93mthin[0m [93mpolymeric[0m [93mfilm[0m into a [93msolution[0m [93mphase[0m, [93melectrochemically[0m [93mcoupled[0m to [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m at the [93mback[0m [93mside[0m of the [93mfilm[0m. [93mDifferent[0m [93msolution[0m [93mconcentrations[0m [91mchange[0m the [93mpotential[0m at which [93mion[0m [93mtransfer[0m is [93mobserved[0m, which is [93mvisualized[0m by [93munquenching[0m a [93mfluorophore[0m when the [93mredox[0m [95mprobe[0m in the [93mfilm[0m is [93melectrochemically[0m [93moxidized[0m. The [93mmoment[0m of [93mmaximum[0m [93mfluorescence[0m [91mchange[0m for [93meach[0m [93mpixel[0m is [93mcaptured[0m by a [93mrapid[0m [93mimage[0m [93mburst[0m to [93msimultaneously[0m [93mfind[0m the [93mexcitation[0m [93mpeak[0m [93mpotentials[0m for [93mall[0m [93mpixels[0m. This [93mproduces[0m a [93mconcentration[0m [93mmap[0m, [93mturning[0m a [93msingle[0m [93msensing[0m [93mfilm[0m into a [93mchemical[0m [93mimaging[0m [92mplatform[0m that [93mprovides[0m [93mmillions[0m of [93mconcentration[0m [93mpoints[0m. The [93mimaging[0m [93mprinciple[0m is [93mdemonstrated[0m with a [93mflowing[0m [93mjunction[0m to [93mmap[0m [93mdiffusional[0m [93mmixing[0m of [93mtwo[0m [93msolution[0m [93mstreams[0m with [93mdifferent[0m [93mion[0m [93mconcentrations[0m, [93musing[0m [93mtetraethylammonium[0m as an [93minitial[0m [92mmodel[0m [93mion[0m, to [93machieve[0m [93mmicrometer[0m [93mspatial[0m [93mresolution[0m.
